headline: Morgan Stanley Upgrades Micron (MU) Rating to Overweight, Lifts PT
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the 11 Best American Semiconductor Stocks to Invest In. On October 6, Morgan Stanley upgraded its rating on Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) from Equalweight to Overweight and increased its price target from $160 to $220. This decision by the firm comes as momentum in core DRAM pricing continues […]
